software.description: This is a Matlab demo for constructing a neuro-anatomical shape complex atlas from 3D MRI brain structures, which is based on the paper "Ting Chen, Anand Rangarajan, Stephan J. Eisenschenk and Baba C. Vemuri, Construction of a Neuroanatomical Shape Complex Atlas from 3D MRI Brain Structures. In NeuroImage, Volume 60, Page 1778-1787, 2012".
